long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remember when TKKS released a detailed set of instructions on how to bring your web browser closer to perfection? Well, TKKS felt that you probably wouldn't be willing to go through all of that hard work just to improve a web browser, so TKKS made an extension that does most of the hard stuff for you!

Now you can perfectionize your web browser's features with one extension!

(For instant access to an all-new perfection, you can click the extension icon to open the TKKS Website Reconstructed in a new tab!)

(To see all of the specific features you are perfectionizing, visit the official Perfection Search website.)
